Package interfaces

Interface INLPComponent

public interface INLPComponent
This is an interface for the INLPComponent, that is required for the ConversationsEngine
Author:
Marcel Engelmann

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addUsedEntities​(List<String> entities)
    Add entities that are used by the skills of the ConversationsEngine
    void addUsedIntents​(List<String> intents)
    Add intents the intents that are used by the skills or the ConversationsEngine
    INLPAnswer understandInput​(String input, String entityName, org.json.JSONObject contextObject)
    Processes the given input to fill the context object with the the given entityName
    INLPAnswer understandInput​(String input, org.json.JSONObject contextObject)
    Processes the given input to fill the context object with the found information in the input

  • Method Details

    • addUsedEntities

      void addUsedEntities​(List<String> entities)
      Add entities that are used by the skills of the ConversationsEngine
      Parameters:
      entities - the entities that are used by the skills of the ConversationsEngine

    • addUsedIntents

      void addUsedIntents​(List<String> intents)
      Add intents the intents that are used by the skills or the ConversationsEngine
      Parameters:
      intents - the intents that are used by the skills or the ConversationsEngine

    • understandInput

      INLPAnswer understandInput​(String input, String entityName, org.json.JSONObject contextObject)
      Processes the given input to fill the context object with the the given entityName
      Parameters:
      input - the input to be processed
      entityName - the entity name to be filled
      contextObject - a reference to the context object used by the ConversationsEngine
      Returns:
      a new INLPAnswer

    • understandInput

      INLPAnswer understandInput​(String input, org.json.JSONObject contextObject)
      Processes the given input to fill the context object with the found information in the input
      Parameters:
      input - the input to be processed
      contextObject - a reference to the context object used by the ConversationsEngine
      Returns:
      a new INLPAnswer
